basics.name: Adam Imdieke
basics.label: Ph.D. Student in Computer Science
basics.summary: Multisensory robot manipulation learning, focusing on novel hardware for robot perception and neural network architectures for manipulation policies. Current work includes developing a tactile skin for robotic arms to enhance whole-body environmental contact sensing.
